mapper.select: SELECT c.COMMENT_NO,c.MEMBER_NO,c.COMMUNITY_NO,c.COMMENT_CONTENT,c.COMMENT_DATE,c.COMMENT_DELFLAG, m.member_name FROM COMMENT_TABLE c, MEMBER m WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = #{community_no} AND c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY COMMENT_NO
SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE FROM COMMENT ORDER BY COMMENT_NO
